title: STEM Education Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science/technology education experience, proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program for in-service elementary teachers to strengthen STEM education design capabilities

learning_goals: One can create a STEM project design document based on learning design models
One can exchange instructional design feedback with fellow teachers through real-time collaboration
One can improve lesson design by utilizing formative assessment tools (surveys/observation checklists)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
